trans-unit.source: Exception class to indicate that the recipient certificate was not valid.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
A string that contains the error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException"></xref> class using the specified serialization information and serialization context.
<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException"></xref> class with the specified error message and the original exception that caused this exception to be thrown.
A string that contains the error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The original exception that caused this exception to be thrown.
